title: Nutcracker 2015
desc:
Manhattan Youth presents its 6th annual?production of "The Nutcracker".  This year?s adaptation will take Clara on a journey of discovery, learning about?feelings, growing up and the world around her. It?s about becoming aware, learning to be tolerant, acceptance of others and oneself and being grateful. 
 Children from all of Manhattan Youths afterschool dance?classes, PS 89, 150,?225, 234, 276,?343, and?397 will take stage. Styles?of dance to include?ballet, hip hop, step, contemporary and creative will share their joy of dance and the spirit of the?holidays with full costumes and sets.
